root.name: Cry Of Fear
root.description: System RequirementsMinimumOS: Windows® 7 (32/64-bit)/Vista/XPProcessor: 1 ghzMemory: 1024 MB RAMGraphics: 128MB Video Card with OpenGL supportHard Drive: 5 GB HD spaceAdditional: Microsoft .NET Framework 4 RequiredRecommendedOS: Windows® 7 (32/64-bit)/Vista/XPProcessor: 2 ghzMemory: 2048 MB RAMGraphics: 512MB Video Card with OpenGL supportHard Drive: 7 GB HD spaceAdditional: Microsoft .NET Framework 4 Required
